original_title: Hollywood Remembers - Hollywoods Greatest Screen Legends
overview: Enjoy this timeless documentary collection that pays tribute to the greatest Hollywood screen legends of all time. Featuring 25 Male and 25 Female stars of the silver screen. Go in-depth on their lives and careers as we honor these Tinseltown treasures
tagline: 50 of the Best Actresses & Actors of All Time
title: Hollywood Remembers - Hollywoods Greatest Screen Legends
